garden.quote: If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need.
garden.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

experience.title: About Company
experience.description: Farmzi have 35 years of experience and know smart way to grow and design your beautiful garden.
experience.who_description: Farmzi is a team passionate about creating sustainable gardens. Since 1989, our agronomists and designers have blended tradition with innovation to craft thriving ecosystems.
experience.quote_text: “Farmzi combines decades of wisdom with modern techniques to design gardens that flourish for generations.”
experience.mission_description1: Our mission is to create sustainable landscapes that inspire and endure. We innovate responsibly, ensuring every garden reflects beauty and purpose.
experience.mission_description2: Our vision is a world where every garden supports biodiversity and sustainability, built on 35 years of expertise.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Farmzi always provide amazing gardening and landscaping services.

action.title: Call To Action
action.description: If you need any gardening service, you can contact with Farmzi.

members.title: Team Members
members.description: Farmzi feel proud for skilled team members.
members.horsley_description: Shoshana founded Farmzi with a vision for sustainable gardening, leading with 35 years of expertise.
members.pennel_description: Kristofer brings precision and passion to every garden, with decades of hands-on experience.
members.jackson_description: Matthew crafts stunning landscapes, blending creativity with ecological insight.

video.title: Company intro video
video.description: See our intro video and lets start your dream project.

clients.description: Farmzi got best feedback from happy clients
